intro.description: This cheat sheet guides you through the order component specifications created by the design pattern.

item.title: Verify Order Component Specifications: TOM_ActivateFunction, TOM_BaseSystem, TOM_BaseGranularity
item.description: The order components have the Namespace and Description set according to the entries in the design pattern. These order components are intended to serve as entities that can be extended by new order components to create a hierarchy. For example, if a new system called BillingSystem is needed, it can extend the base System order component.
